I won't tell you that everything is going to be fine but I will tell you about my grandfather and hope that it helps you.My grandfather is 75 years old. 2 years ago, he had to have open heart surgery, 3 months before my wedding. I live across the country from him so I couldn't even be there to see him. I WAS SCARED!!! My grandfather is a diabetic and has been for years, he too is on all kinds of medication. Anyways, they thought that he was going to have a triple bypass, but once they got him in the operating room and started doing the surgery they realized that it was going to be a quadruple bypass. They did the surgery and my Grandfather came through with flying colors. He was only in the hospital a week to 10 days (I can't quite remember). While he was in the hospital though, I phoned him and he was able to get out of bed and come talk to me for a few minutes. The worst part was that he wasn't sure if he was going to be able to fly in an airplane and come to my wedding, I was very worried about it, but he got the ok and was here for my wedding. A very happy ending, he is still very healthy and is doing GREAT!I know that this may not help your fear but it shows you that my grandfather had the same surgery at 73 years old, and he is fine.I hope your fathers surgery goes well, and he has a quick recovery!!Take Care
